title: Solar PV capacity - new installations worldwide by country 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of newly installed capacity for 10 number of Countrys.
Country China has the highest Percentage of newly installed capacity and Netherlands has the lowest Percentage of newly installed capacity.
The highest Country China has 44.0 more Percentage of newly installed capacity than the lowest Country Netherlands.
